lead_paragraph: A former oil futures broker engineered a jump in the price of oil a year ago and cost his firm millions after a weekend of heavy drinking, Britain’s financial regulator disclosed.
snippet: A former oil futures broker engineered a jump in the price of oil a year ago and cost his firm millions after a weekend of heavy drinking, Britain’s financial regulator disclosed.

headline.seo: British Regulator Fines Drunken Oil Trader
headline.print_headline: Drinking and Trading a Poor Mix for British Broker
